name: appmixer.resend.email.SendEmail
description: Send an email through the Resend Email API.
author: Appmixer <info@appmixer.com>

from.label: From
from.tooltip: Sender email address. To include a friendly name, use the format 'Your Name <sender@domain.com>'.

to.label: To
to.tooltip: Recipient email address. For multiple addresses the values must be separated by a comma, space or newline. Max 50.

html.label: HTML Body
html.tooltip: The HTML version of the message.

text.label: Text Body
text.tooltip: The plain text version of the message.

cc.label: CC
cc.tooltip: CC recipient email address. For multiple addresses, the values must be separated by a comma, space or newline.

bcc.label: BCC
bcc.tooltip: BCC recipient email address. For multiple addresses, the values must be separated by a comma, space or newline.

reply_to.label: Reply To
reply_to.tooltip: Reply-to email address. For multiple addresses, the values must be separated by a comma, space or newline.

headers.label: Headers
headers.tooltip: Custom headers to add to the email. Use JSON format, e.g., {"X-Custom-Header": "Value"}.

idempotency_key.label: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.tooltip: Add an idempotency key to prevent duplicated emails. Should be unique per API request.
